actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 in order to increase the authorization for certain bridge construction over Deep Creek in Idaho, required as a result of the construction of Libby Dam, Montana.

summary.text: Increases by $30,000 (to $380,000) the authorization, under the Water Resources Development Act, for bridge construction over Deep Creek in Idaho, required as a result of the construction of Libby Dam, Montana.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1974 in order to increase the authorization for certain bridge construction over Deep Creek in Idaho, required as a result of the construction of Libby Dam, Montana.
